name: Wrapped BTC
description: An ERC-20 token backed 1:1 with Bitcoin, bringing Bitcoin's liquidity to Ethereum.

name: Wrapped Ether
description: An ERC-20 version of Ether, allowing for easier integration with smart contracts and DeFi protocols.

name: Optimism
description: The native token of the Optimism network, used for governance and gas fee payments.

name: Worldcoin
description: A cryptocurrency aiming to create a global identity and financial network.

name: KWENTA
description: The governance token for Kwenta, a decentralized derivatives trading platform.

name: Tether USD
description: A stablecoin pegged to the US dollar, widely used for trading and value transfer in the crypto ecosystem.

name: USD Coin
description: A fully collateralized US dollar stablecoin, designed for stability and wide adoption in the crypto market.
